title: My boards icon is missing
body:
For about the last hour my boards icon is only a question mark.

I've used the doom bot icon since I got it, I haven't changed anything in game.

Can anyone see it on this post, maybe it's just me who can't see it myself? I have notice a few more people then normal with the ? mark today.

Thanks in advance.

replies.body: Hey there, I've tried to sync up your profile manually but it may not be instant.  The boards can be finicky sometimes, so even though I applied a sync it will just decide on its own when to do that.  ><  Sorry for any delay!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AP3hoWrh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-13T23:18:54.056+0000)
>
> Hey there, I've tried to sync up your profile manually but it may not be instant.  The boards can be finicky sometimes, so even though I applied a sync it will just decide on its own when to do that.  ><  Sorry for any delay!

Thank you very much.  I thought this was a very fast response!  I'm impressed have a great day :)

Still missing I'm not concerned much I'm just wondering if it's my end causing the error.  Anything I can help with.

Honestly, no hurry :)

Second  thread here in years and both times issue resolved Thank You team, just in case I forget to say it.
